name: Si Salim
description:
Salim memarkir grobak bakso yang sudah di dorongnya selama 3 jam, kakinya tidak lelah namun ia hanya ingin rehat sejenak untuk menyegarkan isi kepalanya. Salim berhenti di warung pojok langganannya, segelas kopi tubruk ia pesan sekalian dengan sebatang kretek kesukaannya. "Bu radionya dong Bu! Boleh di keraskan?" tanyanya pada pemilik warung. Berdendanglah dari radio lagu kesukaanya menghiasi momen rehatnya. 

___ 

After 3 hours of walk Salim parked his *bakso cart near by small *warung and enjoy his time smoking his favorite cloves ciggaret and a glass of *kopi tubruk, while listening his favorite song on the Radio.


*Bakso: Indonesian style meatballs-noodle soup.
*Warung: Indonesian homebase/traditional/ciggarets stall also sell snacks and bevarages. 
*Kopi Tubruk: Indonesian most common method of coffee brewing , means "colliding coffee". Pouring boiling water into a cup filled with coarsely grounded coffee and sugar.


0:23 secs  1080X1080p 
Story-Illustration and instrumental beat.
